name: Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan
overview: In Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan the player controls the Air Traffic lines. Have to check the arrivals and departures of the planes and indicate them the proper place to land or take off. The screen shows an isometric view of an airport. A couple of runways, a jumbo sitting at a gate, a second jumbo coming in to circle above. The player has four arrival/departure gates and one or two runways at your disposal. The player's task, sitting in the tower, is to tell the incoming aircraft it's clear to land, and then to direct it to a free gate. And to send the ground crew in to attend the waiting aircraft, direct it to a runway, and clear it for take-off. Meanwhile, other aircraft arrive, and those on the ground load up with passengers, and then look to you for directions. The game goal is to achieve a target score (successful arrivals & departures) within a time limit.
